io.netty.handler.codec.http2

Class StreamBufferingEncoder.Http2GoAwayException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • io.netty.handler.codec.http2.Http2Exception
          • io.netty.handler.codec.http2.StreamBufferingEncoder.Http2GoAwayException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    StreamBufferingEncoder

    public static final class StreamBufferingEncoder.Http2GoAwayException
extends Http2Exception
    Thrown by StreamBufferingEncoder if buffered streams are terminated due to receipt of a GOAWAY.
    See Also:
